info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:18PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bannock County and the Papa Roach Concert through 715 PM MDT... At 616 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pocatello, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, strong wind gusts to 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge and Fort Hall Townsite. Those attending the Papa Roach Concert at the Portneuf Wellness Complex are in the path of this storm and should prepare for DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS and to seek shelter within the hour. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
